link_multiple.expression: create table #OLEDBProvProp (ID int NOT NULL,Description sysname NOT NULL , Flags int NOT NULL, Name sysname null) declare name_cursor cursor FOR {0} for read only open name_cursor DECLARE @providername sysname FETCH NEXT FROM name_cursor INTO @providername WHILE (@@FETCH_STATUS <> -1) BEGIN IF (@@FETCH_STATUS <> -2) BEGIN SELECT @providername = RTRIM(@providername) insert #OLEDBProvProp (ID,Description, Flags) EXECUTE master.dbo.xp_prop_oledb_provider @providername update #OLEDBProvProp set Name = @providername where Name is null END FETCH NEXT FROM name_cursor INTO @providername END CLOSE name_cursor DEALLOCATE name_cursor
